repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:stretch

RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y --allow-unauthenticated \
    aspcud bzip2 curl g++ git libgdbm-dev libncurses5-dev make m4 \
    pkg-config sudo unzip wget gnupg python3-matplotlib \
    python3-scipy && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y --allow-unauthenticated \
    python3-setuptools python3-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
